columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the event was recorded

columns.name: TeamsMessageId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the message, as generated by Microsoft 365

columns.name: Action
columns.description: Action taken on the message: Blocked, Moved to quarantine

columns.name: ActionType
columns.description: Type of activity that triggered the event: Manual remediation, Phish ZAP, Malware ZAP

columns.name: ActionTrigger
columns.description: Indicates whether an action was triggered by an administrator (manually or through approval of a pending automated action), or by some special mechanism, such as a ZAP or Dynamic Delivery

columns.name: RecipientDetails
columns.description: Array of recipient data (RecipientSmtpAddress, RecipientDisplayName, RecipientType, RecipientObjectId)

columns.name: ThreatTypes
columns.description: Verdict from the filtering stack on whether the message contains malware, phishing, or other threats

columns.name: ConfidenceLevel
columns.description: List of confidence levels for each threat type identified

columns.name: DetectionMethods
columns.description: Methods used to detect malware, phishing, or other threats found in the message

columns.name: LatestDeliveryLocation
columns.description: Last known location of the message

columns.name: IsExternalThread
columns.description: Indicates if there are external recipients in the thread (1) or none (0)
